##Platform-specific articles

*Pieces which apply to social video on one platform only.*

###Facebook Video

* [A look inside thre video strategies of 7 digital-native publishers on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/facebookmedia/blog/a-look-inside-the-video-strategies-of-7-digital-native-publishers-on-facebook) (Facebook Media, May 2018)
* [How Facebook Watch stacks up to Facebook videos and YouTube](http://www.newswhip.com/2018/07/facebook-watch/) (Newswhip, July 2018) - some interesting analysis of engagement levels and length of FAcebook Watch vids. 
* [What we've learnt from the most engaging Facebook videos of 2019 so far](https://www.newswhip.com/2019/02/top-facebook-videos/) (Newswhip, February 2019)
* [Is a shorter video length more engaging on Facebook?](https://www.newswhip.com/2019/03/video-length-engaging-facebook/) (Newswhip, March 2019) - short answer, yes. But there are complications. 
* [An Update on Video Ranking](http://newsroom.fb.com/news/2019/05/updates-to-video-ranking/) (Facebook, May 2019) - they're trying to incentivise longer video production
* [What types of video drive reactions on Facebook?](https://www.newswhip.com/2019/06/reactions-facebook-social-video/) (Newswhip, June 2019)

###Twitter Video

* [How publishers are learning to embrace Twitter video](http://www.newswhip.com/2018/03/twitter-video-publishers/#QDVJgYXSUoCebVHW.99) (Newswhip, Mar 2018)
* [Publishers gets boost from Twitter video](https://digiday.com/media/big-resurgence-publishers-get-boost-twitter-video/) (Digiday, Feb 2018)


###LinkedIn Video

* [How is LinkedIn video different](http://www.newswhip.com/2017/10/linkedin-video/) - and how can you use it? (Newswhip, Oct 2017)

###Instagram Stories

* [*The Guardian* finds less polished video works better on Instagram](https://digiday.com/media/guardian-finds-less-polished-video-works-better-instagram/) (Digiday, July 2018)
* [Instagram Stories vs Snapchat Stories](http://www.newswhip.com/2018/07/best-instagram-stories-snapchat-stories/) (Newswhip, July 2018)
* [5 things to know about successful Instagram and Snapchat stories](https://www.newswhip.com/2018/09/5-tricks-snapchat-instagram/) (Newswhip, September 2018)
